question: Which company has recently launched first BS-VI motorcycle of India?
explanation: Hero MotoCorp launched India’s first BS-VI compliant motorcycle, Splendor iSmart at Rs 64,900. According to the company, the bike is designed at center of innovation in Jaipur. It offers 45 per cent less emission. The new motorcycle features the idle start stop system, called the i3S system, with added emphasis on fuel efficiency. The Splendor iSmart will be made available in a phased manner across the country.BS VI the sixth mandate for vehicular emissions, is a move to controlling air pollution in the country.
